mapper.insert: insert into order_tbl (mbsp_id, ord_name, ord_addr_zipcode, ord_addr_basic, ord_addr_detail, ord_tel, ord_mail, ord_price) values (#{mbsp_id}, #{ord_name}, #{ord_addr_zipcode}, #{ord_addr_basic}, #{ord_addr_detail}, #{ord_tel}, #{ord_mail}, #{ord_price})
insert into ordetail_tbl select #{ord_code}, c.pro_num , c.cart_amount , p.pro_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
mapper.select: select ot.ord_code, pt.pro_name, pt.pro_up_folder, pt.pro_img, ot.dt_price, ot.dt_amount, pt2.payment_status from ordetail_tbl ot inner join product_tbl pt on ot.pro_num = pt.pro_num inner join payment_tbl pt2 on pt2.ord_code = ot.ord_code where ot.ord_code = #{ord_code}

select o.ord_code, o.ord_regdate, pt.pro_up_folder, pt.pro_img, pt.pro_name, odt.pro_num, odt.dt_price , odt.dt_amount, payt.payment_status from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl odt on o.ord_code = odt.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on odt.pro_num = pt.pro_num inner join payment_tbl payt on odt.ord_code = payt.ord_code where o.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id} order by o.ord_regdate desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}

select count(*) from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl odt on o.ord_code = odt.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on odt.pro_num = pt.pro_num inner join payment_tbl payt on odt.ord_code = payt.ord_code where o.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
select ct.cate_name from product_tbl pt inner join category_tbl ct on pt.cate_code = ct.cate_code where pt.pro_num = #{pro_num}

select o.ord_code, o.ord_regdate, pt.pro_up_folder, pt.pro_img, pt.pro_name, odt.pro_num, dt.delivery_date, pt.cate_code from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl odt on o.ord_code = odt.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on odt.pro_num = pt.pro_num inner join deliveries_tbl dt on o.ord_code = dt.ord_code where o.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id} and dt.delivery_status = '배송완료' order by o.ord_code desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}

select count(*) from order_tbl o inner join ordetail_tbl odt on o.ord_code = odt.ord_code inner join product_tbl pt on odt.pro_num = pt.pro_num inner join deliveries_tbl dt on o.ord_code = dt.ord_code where o.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id} and dt.delivery_status = '배송완료'
